		                    Stage II Wilms Tumor
		                    Treatment of stage II Wilms tumor with favorable histology may include:         -  Nephrectomy with removal of lymph nodes, followed by combination chemotherapy.        Treatment of stage II anaplastic Wilms tumor may include:         - Nephrectomy with removal of lymph nodes, followed by radiation therapy to the abdomen and comb
